subject: Coupon Code
description_text:
Hello. I would like to change my coupon code for my affiliate account under
this email. It is currently set to my name. Can it be changed to 00777
please? Or to DYNXXR if numbers are not allowed.

Thank You

conversations.body_text: Hi Dinnelky Tavarez,    Alright, I've modified it for you to: DYNXXR
